title: **- 1 TRUE BED + HOME OFFICE - 2 BATHROOMS - 11FT CEILINGS - FLEX 3
posting_body: ['**-- 1 TRUE BED + HOME OFFICE -- 2 BATHROOMS -- 11FT CEILINGS -- OAK STRIP FLOORING--**', 'Listing ID #: 212917', 'Price: $4,538', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Light', 'Marble Bath', 'Renovated', 'Stunning 1 bedroom + home office!', 'Wall for 2nd bedroom up already!', 'Can flex to a 3 bed!', '2 FULL BATHROOMS!!', '**Broker fee applies', '24/7 concierge, Live-in super State of the art fitness center Resident lounge Furnished roof deck Laundry on site Valet services', 'Located in the heart of the Financial District, this building is within walking distance to the South Street Seaport, Brookfield Place, and all major subway lines (1,2,3,A,C,E,Path train)', 'Contact Anthony today to book an appointment!', 'Call/text @ 917 721 3315 or Email:', '<URL>', 'Anthony Bernard', 'Phone: (212) 402-7855', 'Mobile: 9177213315', 'Fax: (212) 402-7856', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (212) 402-7855 \xa0 9177213315 \xa0 FAX (212) 402-7856 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Anthony Bernard at 9177213315']
